monsterSpecials: Dive Attack. If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage to the target.
Flyby. The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
monsterActions: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (3d6+2) piercing damage.
